title: 92/238/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 April 1992 calling upon the Kingdom of the Netherlands to postpone the adoption of a draft Regulation in respect of the labelling of emulsified fats (Only the Dutch text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 13 April 1992  calling upon the Kingdom of the Netherlands to postpone the adoption of a draft Regulation in respect of the labelling of emulsified fats  (Only the Dutch text is authentic)  (92/238/EEC)
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Kingdom of the Netherlands shall, for a period of 12 months from the notification of this Decision, postpone the adoption of its draft Regulation in respect of measures requiring the fat content of emulsified fats to be indicated on the  labelling of such products.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 April 1992. For the Commission
Karel VAN MIERT
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 33, 8. 2. 1979, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 42, 15. 2. 1991, p. 27. (3) COM (91) 536 final. (4) COM (91) 462 final.
